snippet.title: Oneiro Man Trailer
snippet.description:
Oneiro Man is a game where you play as an office worker who is forced to stay up all night to complete some reports or face being fired. In the game, you'll have to type out texts and complete your dreams to avoid falling asleep. The game lasts about 20 minutes, offering a short but fun experience with surprises and craziness. It features three different endings depending on your performance and seven amazing mini-games.

We're proud to announce that Oneiro Man will be released on May 1st. We believe the timing is appropriate since Oneiro Man is partly a critique of overwork and the abuse of workers by companies.

We invite you to try out Oneiro Man on May 1st.
